item.name: Llangibby Estate
item.winemaker: Chris Addams Williams, John Williamson, James Hastwell
item.description: Chris Addams Williams and John Williamson have established a substantial vineyard cresting a ridge close to Echunga, at an altitude of 360m. The vineyard plantings have morphed since the outset; there are now 7.09ha of sauvignon blanc, 0.17ha pinot gris, 1.95 tempranillo and 0.17ha pinot noir, with most of the grapes sold to other producers. Exports to the UK.
